unnormalised: Flash sales, eh? It's like trying to grab the last plate of biryani at an Onam feast! By the time you load the page, everything's "Out of Stock" faster than a Chennai auto-rickshaw. My internet speed feels like a bullock cart on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway. Is it even real, ya? Or just Maya, like my dreams of getting a discount at Fabindia?
